name: Kids Fruits - Toddlers Learn Fruits
description:
This educational and entertaining game teaches children to recognize fruits, articulate them to words. We are here to let your loved one learn and improve, making learning a fun experience.

Toddlers Fruits App for your kids will team toddlers to solve simple puzzles to increase their skills. After playing and decorating the fruits they will be given a chance to form words by recognizing letters, which are spelt for them.

We have crafted the Toddlers fruits application in such a way that interacting with devices can be connected positively to enable your child for a very early learning experience making your child to be at the forefront.

Features
-Decorate your fruits
-Play a simple puzzle games
-Learn letters
-Learn word formation
-Perfect for 2 – 4 year olds
-Discounted premium version

Our team of designers and developers create apps that have great value for children, something that they will love and parents trust. We build Apps by studying children to blend the apps into their natural learning and entertaining curves. Toddlers Solar system learning App is the ideal first app for your loved one.
